name: ForexNinja
0:
”Alexa, ask Forex Ninja to get rate for Canada”
”Get exchange rate for India”
”New Zealand”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: forex ninja
des: A skill to get get the current exchange rate for a country. The base currency is currently set to USD. You can say the country name and the skill will get the US exchange rate for it's currency symbol.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
